comment._content: Karl Dieffenbach (Born November 2 1859; d. March 17 1936 in Düsseldorf) was a Prussian officer and General of infantry in the first world war. de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Karl_Dieffenbach

comment._content: artolog: Thanks for providing us with Dieffenbach's first name, etc.  We'll include this information next time we update.
